title: Central Hub Person Detection
excerpt: Improving human detection accuracy by filtering out static objects like humanoid punching bags using motion tracking.
author: Codem
content:
Project Overview

Using OpenCV, I had earlier implemented basic human detection as a command for the Central Hub. However, I encountered an issue where it constantly returned True for human presence.

The Challenge

Realizing this false positive was caused by a humanoid punching bag within the webcam's field of view, I had to refine the logic. It wasn't enough to just detect a 'person' shape.

The Solution

I updated the script to not only identify a person but also verify if the bounding box is moving. This logic allows the system to successfully differentiate between a living human and a static object. You can check out my portfolio to see more of my work.
